personalData.description: I'm an aspiring Software Developer passionate about building scalable, user-friendly applications.
personalData.summary: I'm a Software Engineer with **2 years of experience**. I specialise in building scalable systems, improving developer experience, and solving platform-wide productivity and performance challenges across products. I hold a **Bachelor's degree in Information Technology** from Nha Trang University. I enjoy exploring new tech in my free time.

experiencesData.title: Frontend Developer
description: Participated in insurance-related projects utilizing ReactJS for web applications and React Native for mobile platforms.

Analyzed UI designs and user stories, collaborated closely with Backend teams to ensure timely delivery of features, and coordinated with Quality Control teams to resolve defects, including performing hotfixes when necessary.
Attended daily team meetings to report development progress, address blockers, and align on project goals.

title: Hi, I'm $t(personalData.name.short)
location: Nha Trang, Khanh Hoa, Viet Nam
